---
title: "Listing Test Site"
listing:
  contents: posts
  type: default
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      ensureLlmsMdExists: true
      ensureLlmsTxtExists: true
      ensureLlmsMdRegexMatches:
        # Listing page should have post title as link
        - ['\\[Welcome Post\\]']
      ensureLlmsMdRegexNoMatches:
        # No empty links from listing UI elements
        - ['\\[\\]\\(']
      ensureLlmsTxtRegexMatches:
        # Both index and post should be in llms.txt
        - ['\\[Listing Test Site\\]']
        - ['\\[Welcome Post\\]']
        - ['posts/welcome/index\\.llms\\.md']
---

Welcome to the listing test site.
